title: Kennen Ult bug (Gamplay)
body: You can not see the animation of the Kennen ult but you can hear him casting it pls fix

replies.body:
Hey Batschilol -

Thanks for the report! We're still in the process of nailing down a 100% repro for this issue. This doesn't appear to be something affecting all users, and is something we believe to be dealing with compatibility.
